mesa 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Extract the data table from all the contrasts

    getDMRsData.Rd

    This function extracts the information from the DMR contrasts into a wide table

    getDMRsData(
  qseaSet,
  qseaGLM,
  sampleNames = NULL,
  variable = NULL,
  keepData = TRUE,
  keepGroupMeans = TRUE,
  fdrThres = 0.05,
  keepPvals = FALSE,
  keepFragmentInfo = FALSE,
  direction = "both"
)

    Arguments

    qseaSet

    The qseaSet object

    qseaGLM

    A qseaGLM object

    sampleNames

    Which samples to return the information for.

    variable

    Which variable the DMR comparison has been performed on

    keepData

    Whether to keep the individual data columns

    keepGroupMeans

    Whether to keep the group means

    fdrThres

    False discovery rate threshold.

    keepPvals

    Whether to keep the unadjusted p-values in the output

    keepFragmentInfo

    Whether to keep information on the average fragment length and MAPQ (if present)

    direction

    Whether to use regions that are up/down/both.

    Value

    A tibble with the data

    Contents

    Developed by Simon Pearce, Steven Hill.
